law.catch_line: Report of registered brands -- Registration -- Fee -- Records.
law.text: The board shall publish at such times as it deems necessary a report of the brands that have been registered. Every five (5) years thereafter all brands shall be reregistered. The Commissioner shall notify each brand owner and provide the necessary forms. A reregistration fee of five dollars ($5) for each brand shall be charged for the ensuing five (5) year period or fraction thereof. The county clerk and the sheriff of each county, or authority approved by the board shall receive all brand reports without cost and the books shall remain as a part of the permanent records of their respective offices.
